@package time-extras
@version 1.1.4

module Data.Time.Instances
instance Data LocalTime
instance Data ZonedTime
instance Data TimeOfDay
instance Data TimeZone
instance Data UTCTime
instance Data UniversalTime
instance Data Day
instance Data AbsoluteTime
instance Data NominalDiffTime
instance Data DiffTime
